item.title: Getting Started with Hextra
item.description: Learn how to set up and customize your Hextra site with featured images and beautiful blog layouts.<img src="http://localhost:1313/blog/getting-started/featured.svg" alt="Hextra" />

item.title: Advanced Hextra Features
item.description: Explore advanced features of Hextra including search, dark mode, and multilingual support.
